import React from 'react'; import { Animated } from 'react-animated-css'; import '../../styles/About/About.css'; const AboutStory = () => { return (

About Me

Hello, i'm Filippo, i live in Cuneo, Italy and I attend ITIS M. Delpozzo in computer science, robotic curvature.

I'm also a musician, I have been playing the guitar since I was 6 years old. I attended various courses on udemy on web programming (nodejs, react, jquery) and through the competition called NAO challenge I deepened my knowledge of python and bash.

During the past 2 years I have acquired skills such as management and division of tasks in a team and thanks to my father I have learned to juggle basic electronics and soldering.

Education

Itis M. Delpozzo - Current

Download My Resume
); }; export default AboutStory;
